name: Toni Iordache
description: '''Toni Iordache''' (17 December 1942 – 20 February 1988) was a [[Romani people|Romani]]-[[Romania]]n ''[[Lăutari|lăutar]]'' and one of the most famous ''[[cimbalom]]'' ([[Romanian language|Romanian]]: ''ţambal'') players in the world. He was nicknamed ''the God of the Cimbalom'' and ''Paganini of the cimbalom''.
